short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vitrose highlights items on waitrose.com that are eligible for the Vitality cashback scheme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This allows users to make an informed decision. Certain categories might broadly be included in the cashback scheme, but not all items (e.g. chicken, milk, fruits) and this information is not displayed on waitrose.com, only in the category listing.

This extension is updated regularly as the category listing changes, however no warranty is given on the accuracy due to being out of date or any other reason.

Note that this extension is not in anyway affiliated with Waitrose or Vitality.
